nodes.text: The Typhoon-2 Submersible Vehicle was a submersible craft that was available on the planet Mon Calamari around the time of the Rebellion. This was an example of a typical craft available to rent at the Seabed Lodge, located within the Fathoms complex in Wildwater City. These craft were rented to tourists so they could explore the surrounding oceans.

They were sometimes used for sinister purposes well as the enforcer Nollo Kanx would sometimes take victims on a submersible ride before dumping them into the trench Rako's Rift to be eaten by a krakana.
The Typhoon-2 was designed by Paul Danner and Bill Smith for Wretched Hives of Scum & Villainy, a supplement for the Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game that was published by West End Games in 1997.
